title: Desert farming
creator_credit: Arthur G. Evans, Lou Lilly, Quartet Films and West
brief_description: Describes the conservation approaches and the modern technology used by scientists to convert deserts into blooming farmlands; how we have learned to bring water for irrigation, leech the soil of unwanted chemicals, and provide proper drainage. Shows machinery used, crops grown, harvesting and packaging.
